name: Writing Table (Bureau Plat)
description: Writing Table (Bureau Plat); Attributed to André-Charles Boulle (French, 1642 - 1732, master before 1666); Paris, France; about 1710 - 1715; Oak veneered with brass, ebony, and tortoise shell (contre partie); 80.5 x 98.4 x 194.5 cm (31 11/16 x 38 3/4 x 76 9/16 in.); 85.DA.23; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Writing Table (Bureau Plat)
medium: Oak veneered with brass, ebony, and tortoise shell (contre partie)
